text: Marina Lavrentievna Popovich (née Vasiliyeva; July 20, 1931 – November 30, 2017) was a Soviet Air Force colonel, engineer, and legendary Soviet test pilot. She held 102Marina Popovich at Best People of Russia site.Russian Cosmonaut Marina Popovich discloses UFOs. - ExopoliticsTV interview with Alfred Lambremont Webre. aviation world records set on over 40 types of aircraft. She was one of the most famous pilots in Russian history, and one of the most important female pilots of all time. ==References== ==Other websites== * Records at fai.org Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Soviet military people Category:Russian aerospace engineers Category:Aviators Category:People from Smolensk Oblast
title: Marina Popovich
